value.title: Video shows Seattle-area teacher scold 10-year-old for admiring Trump: mom
value.excerpt: A Seattle-area middle school teacher scolded his 10-year-old student and briefly kicked him out of his virtual classroom last week after the child said he admires President Trump.

value.title: Trump pledges to pass 'THE BIGGEST TAX CUT EVER' in early morning campaign tweetstorm from Walter Reed

value.title: CNN supercut shows how Trump has repeatedly mocked his opponents’ health

value.excerpt: Alec Baldwin says he wouldn't have reprised his role as President Donald Trump on "SNL" while Trump was hospitalized if he was "truly, gravely ill."

value.title: If Trump's symptoms started before Friday, he may have been highly infectious during the debate
value.excerpt: People can be contagious before showing COVID-19 symptoms. Depending on when Trump's started, he might have been infectious when debating Biden.
